sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import EyeIcon from 'mdi-react/EyeIcon'; import Subheader from '../Subheader/subheader'; import './job.css'; import {Container} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Icon, Label, Menu, Table } from 'semantic-ui-react' import _ from 'lodash'; const tableData = [ { description: 'John', category: "none", asset: "none", duedate: 'Sep 23rd 2021', lastupdate: 'Sep 22nd 2021' }, { description: 'Amber', category: "none", asset: "none", duedate: 'Sep 21st 2021', lastupdate: 'Sep 22nd 2021' }, { description: 'Leslie', category: "none", asset: "none", duedate: 'Sep 24th 2021', lastupdate: 'Sep 22nd 2021' }, { description: 'Ben', category: "none", asset: "none", duedate: 'Sep 26rd 2021', lastupdate: 'Sep 22nd 2021' }, ] function exampleReducer(state, action) { switch (action.type) { case 'CHANGE_SORT': if (state.column === action.column) { return { ...state, data: state.direction === 'ascending' ? _.orderBy(state.data, [action.column], ['desc']):(state.direction === 'null'?_.orderBy(state.data, [action.column], ['asc']) : state.data ) , direction: state.direction === 'ascending' ? 'descending' : (state.direction === 'null'? 'ascending': 'null'), } } return { column: action.column, data:_.orderBy(state.data, [action.column], ['asc']), direction: 'ascending', } default: throw new Error() } } export default function Job() { const [state, dispatch] = React.useReducer(exampleReducer, { column: null, data: tableData, direction: null, }) const { column, data, direction } = state return(
Status Priority dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_SORT', column: 'description' })} > Description dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_SORT', column: 'category' })} > Category dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_SORT', column: 'asset' })} > Asset dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_SORT', column: 'duedate' })} > Due date dispatch({ type: 'CHANGE_SORT', column: 'lastupdate' })} > Last Update Actions {data.map(({ category, asset, description,duedate,lastupdate }) => ( {description} {category} {asset} {duedate} {lastupdate} ))} 1 2 3 4
); }
